```{r}
if (!identical(Sys.getenv("emlwr.eval_fits"), "true")) {
  eval_fits <- FALSE
} else {
  eval_fits <- TRUE
}

if (!eval_fits) {
  data_files <- list.files("data/04-search", full.names = TRUE)
  data_files <- data_files[grepl("\\.Rda", data_files)]
  loaded <- lapply(data_files, load)
}
```
